text: Yadi tomara ubhaye allahara kache ta'obaha kara (tabe ta tomadera jan'ya kalyanakara), karana tomadera hrdaya to jhumke pareche. Kintu tomara yadi nabira birud'dhe eke an'yera posakata kara [1] tabe jene rakha, niscaya allaha tara sahayyakari ebam jibarila o satkarmasila muminara'o. Tachara an'yan'ya pheresatagana'o tara sahayogitakari
